value.name: Blackmon, Calvin Daniel (Summerville)
value.description: Calvin Daniel Blackmon, 58, of Summerville, Georgia, died on Saturday, January 12, 2013, at his residence. Mr. Blackmon was born November 28, 1953, in Summerville, the son of Eula Mae Hill ...
